quotes.quote: You must live in the present, launch yourself on every wave, find your eternity in each moment.
Waves are not measured in feet or inches, they are measured in increments of fear.
Famous people feel that they must perpetually be on the crest of the wave, not realising that it is against all the rules of life. You can't be on top all the time, it isn't natural.
You and I are all as much continuous with the physical universe as a wave is continuous with the ocean.
I insist upon the view that all is waves.
You have come from God, you are a spark of his glory you are a wave of that ocean of bliss you will get peace only when you again merge in Him.
Every wave, regardless of how high and forceful it crests, must eventually collapse within itself.
Just take your time - wave comes. Let the other guys go, catch another one.
The song of the curved line is called happiness.
You can either see yourself as a wave in the ocean or you can see yourself as the ocean.
When the life is wavy, keep your mind smooth.
Life comes at us in waves. We can't predict or control those waves, but we can learn to surf
Life is like a road with so many twist, turns; blind curves; Stop signages and much more, giving us a wavy ride to reach destination.
You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
It's easy to not feel misplaced if this tidal wave of appreciation is coming your way.
Life is a wave, which in no two consecutive moments of its existence is composed of the same particles.
